Incident details: An unforeseen medical information leak transpired during the night. Possible reasons: Potential vulnerability in the firewall setup My name is Omar Hassan.. Actions taken: Servers were restarted, log files were examined, and IT personnel were informed. You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.
